full_summary:
================
**Senior Special Advisor**
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01011985

**Tender Details:**

*   **Public Works and Government Services Canada** is seeking a senior-level advisor to provide expertise in IT management and information management.
*   The successful candidate will provide advice and recommendations at the Director General, Assistant Deputy Minister, and Deputy Minister levels.
*   The contract will be for one (1) year with an option to extend for two additional one (1) year periods.
*   The selection process will be conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.
*   Interested suppliers can submit a bid by the closing date of **November 25, 2022, at 14:00 hours.**

**Security Requirements:**

*   The successful contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) with approved Document Safeguarding at the level of PROTECTED B.
*   Contractor personnel requiring access to PROTECTED information, assets, or sensitive sites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS.
*   Processing of PROTECTED material electronically at the contractor's site is not permitted.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

*   The evaluation will be based on the best overall proposal.
*   The evaluation team will assess the proposers' expertise, experience, and approach to delivering the required services.

**Language:**

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Attachments:**

*   The following attachments are available for download:
    *   [Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/3d035b420023a95c803efe9533a8b4c6/10075734_-_rfp_-_en.pdf)
    *   [Attachment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/927d947ed241abc024cb44018d01c6ec/application_for_registration_-_afr_471-e.pdf)
    *   [Attachment 3](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/01a170a3877561dbbbfacd03f77928f1/10075734_-_addendum_1_-_en.pdf)
    *   [Attachment 4](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/486
